messages.content:
You are a young sci-fi writer. You need to write creative things. If the world is boring, the audience will boo at you, and it won't buy your book. Every time you give an answer re-evaluate if it is boring or not. If you think it's boring, try writing again. Try to impress the readers. What you come up with must not be similar to English.
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.

Construct a country. Give short answers to the following questions:
* Country name, key: country_name
* Country short description, key: country_description
* Country people short description, key: people_description
* National language name, key: language_name
* National language short description, key: language_description
* Example sentence in the national language, key: example_sentence
* Its translation to English, key: example_sentence_translation

{
  "country_name": "Xalax",
  "country_description": "Xalax is a country located on a small, isolated island in the middle of the ocean. Its landscapes are diverse, ranging from lush jungles to mountainous terrains.",
  "people_description": "The Xalaxians are a hardy and self-reliant people, with a strong sense of community.",
  "language_name": "Zalaxian",
  "language_description": "Zalaxian is a guttural language with many glottal stops, primarily spoken by the people of Xalax.",
  "example_sentence": "Haxun qakal kezalax shalaxon.",
  "example_sentence_translation": "The sun rises over the mountains of Xalax." 
}

Give me a phrasebook in Zalaxian
I want every reply to be formatted as a list of JSON objects. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard. Each object must include these key-value pairs:
* Original phrase in English; key: original
* Translation to Zalaxian; key: translation
In addition to whatever phrases you come up with, add these phrases, if they are not already there:
* Document
* Work
* Immigration office
* Required
* I do not understand
* Too fast
* Orchard

Generate me a quenta or a biography of a citizen of a neighbouring country.
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Full name; key: name
* Neighboring country name; key: country
* Date of birth; key: dob
* Employer company name; key: employer
* Employer company address in Xalax; key: employer_address
* Job title of the person; key: job_title
* Job duties; key: job_duties
* Salary; key: salary
* Person's address in Xalax; key: address
* Rent price for that apartment; key: rent

{
  "name": "Sara Khan",
  "country": "Zaloria",
  "dob": "1990-03-15",
  "employer": "Zaloria Co.",
  "employer_address": "Xalorian Tower, Xalax Island",
  "job_title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "job_duties": "Developing and maintaining software applications for the company's clients",
  "salary": "5500 Xalaxian Dollars per month",
  "address": "12 Cypress Grove, Xalax Island",
  "rent": "1500 Xalaxian Dollars per month"
}

Translate from English to Zalaxian:
"Work Permit
--------
Full Name: Sara Khan
Company of employment: Zaloria Co.
Job title: Senior Software Engineer
Company address: Xalorian Tower, Xalax Island"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

{
  "translation": "Haqilax Laxorix
--------
Laxorix Halax: Sara Khan
Haqilax haqilaxor: Zaloria Co.
Kaxar haqilaxoror: Senior Software Engineer
Haqilax haqilaxororor laxorix: Xalorian Tower, Xalax Island"
}

Job title: Senior Software Engineer
Job duties: Developing and maintaining software applications for the company's clients
Salary: 5500 Xalaxian Dollars per month
Company address: Xalorian Tower, Xalax Island"
I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.
* Translation; key: translation

I want every reply to be formatted as JSON. Do not ever write anything other then valid JSON. Do not add "Note". JSON multi-line strings should be put on a single line with new line characters, as expected by JSON standard.

country.country_description: Xalax is a country located on a small, isolated island in the middle of the ocean. Its landscapes are diverse, ranging from lush jungles to mountainous terrains.
country.people_description: The Xalaxians are a hardy and self-reliant people, with a strong sense of community.
country.language_description: Zalaxian is a guttural language with many glottal stops, primarily spoken by the people of Xalax.
country.example_sentence_translation: The sun rises over the mountains of Xalax.

messages.content:
Pretend you are an immigration officer at an immigration office. You only talk as the officer, you never reply to your own phrases on my behalf or on behalf of a migrant.
Pretend that I, a recent migrant, walk in, and approach your window.

For an immigrant registration the procedure is as follows:
1. Greeting and ask for what the purpose is. Confirm that this is for the registration.
2. Ask for the name and identity documents
3. If the identity documents are alright, scan them for filing
4. Ask for a reason to immigrate
5. If it is for work, ask for the work permit and employment contract
6. Ask for the postal address
7. Thank them and tell that they will receive the residence permit via post in 14 to 21 days
8. Say "%%SUCCESS%%" when finished
This will be a dialog. Reply one phrase at a time please.
hi
Hello, how can I assist you today? Is this for immigration registration?
<speaks with an accent> Island
I'm sorry, I didn't understand. Could you please repeat that again?
